document_data.name: Johanna
document_data.mainbody:
'''Johanna''' was a commoner who resided in the village of [[Imnesvale (town)|Imnesvale]] in the [[Umar Hills]] of [[Amn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''You look like the decent sort who can hold a [[sword]]... why don't you go and slaughter those [[ogre]]s and save us all a lot of trouble?''|Johanna}}
document_data.Description: Johanna was a fair-skinned [[human]] woman who wore tan-colored commoner's clothing.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the village of Imnesvale faced a slew of disappearances and locals did not hesitate to blame the legendary [[Umar Witch]]. Johanna and her husband [[Ander (Imnesvale)|Ander]] spent much of his free time in the [[Umar Inn]]. Unlike her husband, she believed that the features spiriting way Imnesvale's villagers were recently-arrived ogres who could be found in the Umar Hills. She did not trust the creatures even after it was revealed they meant the village no harm. Johanna through that the adventurers who negotiated with the ogres were to be their next meal.
